duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and maintain Cloudera infrastructure and environments for data processing and analysis.
Optimize data warehousing solutions for efficient storage and retrieval of large datasets.
Utilize Python for scripting and automation of administrative tasks and data processing.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to data processing, storage, and retrieval within Cloudera environments.
Collaborate with data engineering and analysis teams to support big data initiatives and projects.
Provide technical support and guidance to users on Cloudera administration and data-related queries.
